meaningMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>poor</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>poor</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You know the word 先ず (まず)? It means something along the lines of "first of all." So, if you're <vocabulary>poor</vocabulary>, <reading>first of all</reading> (まず), you're going to want to get some help. Second of all, learn how to play the guitar and make funny jokes.
